name: Genetics
description: Topics for this lecture and laboratory (or project) course include: a brief review of DNA structure, transcription, and translation; inheritance and its chromosomal basis; gene interactions; sources and types of mutations and the relationship of mutation to genetic disease and evolution; genetic dissection of biological processes; genetic technologies and genomic approaches.
prerequisites: [[BIOB10H3 and BIOB11H3] or BIOB10Y3] and [PSYB07H3 or STAB22H3]
